text: & Pam Tillis Trisha Yearwood burst onto the country music scene in 1991 with her No. 1 Debut single “She’s in Love with the Boy.” Eight years later, on March 13, … [American Songwriter](/@AmericanSong) flipped this story into [American Songwriter](/@americansong/american-songwriter-ekb4k1igz)•1h Related storyboards More stories from [Canadian Music](/topic/canadamusic) [When a Leaf turns into a 'brick': Juno winner describes EV catastrophe](/topic/canadamusic/when-a-leaf-turns-into-a-brick-juno-winner-describes-ev-catastrophe/a-GQ9DaMoeQT21aQ_MKNh6lw%3Aa%3A107108217-d762b9bbd2%2Fcbc.ca) The owner of a Nissan Leaf electric car says his experience has been a cautionary tale for others who might make the leap to electric vehicles.
